name: Glitch Recordz
description:
As a part-time Dj, i often collect some of vinyl recrods whether just for my personal collection or play it on a clubnight. Jazz to techno, Orchestra to UK-Breaks, From Daft Punk to Hans Zimmer, it is on my collection.

This artwork basically my tribute to anyone out there who still collecting vinyls. A bit pumpy animation to keep the spirit flamable.

- Boogie Bronson 2021
